    • Method Detail

      • hasPoint

        public boolean hasPoint(int x,
                        int y)
        Description copied from class: GeometricBody
        hasPoint checks if Geometric Body has point on that pixel so drawOnPicture method can paint point. Returns true if it pixel is in geometric body.
        Specified by:
        hasPoint in class GeometricBody
        Parameters:
        x - position of Point on the x-axis.
        y - position of Point on the y-axis.
        Returns:
        true if it has point ,false if point is not inside geometric body.
